isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - Meritor Transfer Cases MTC-4208, -4210, and -4213 - Power Take-Off (PTO) - Remove Transfer Case Rear Access Cover

svcproc.title: Remove Transfer Case Rear Access Cover

step1.para: Park the vehicle on a level surface. Block the wheels to prevent the vehicle from moving.
Remove air from the vehicle's system.
Place a suitable container under the transfer case to catch the hydraulic fluid that will drain when you remove the rear access cover.
Remove the eight mounting bolts and washers that secure the transfer case rear access cover. Remove the cover (Figure 68).
Clean the PTO mounting surface to remove all sealant.
